Subscription.Description: Important User and Security Group Events from all Domain Computers and Domain Controllers
Subscription.Query:
<QueryList> <!-- Event log service events --> <Query Id="0" Path="System"> <Select Path="System">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Eventlog']]]</Select> </Query>
<!-- Security Log cleared events (1102), EventLog Service shutdown (1100) --> <Query Id="1" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=1102 or EventID = 1100)]]</Select> </Query>
<!-- Other Log cleared events (104) --> <Query Id="2" Path="System"> <Select Path="System">*[System[(EventID=104)]]</Select> </Query>
<!-- Event log service events specific to Security channel --> <Query Id="3" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Eventlog']]]</Select> </Query> </QueryList>
